title: Matchsafe
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Figure of woman drinking from yellow bottle. Figure wears orange dress with white ruffle around neck, gree kerchief with white ruffle and white apron with band of stripes on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe.
Porcelain. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1982-23-677.
